actions.text: Amendment SA 1192 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 1192 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Ensign to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9202; text: CR S9202) To fulfill the Administration's request to move towards the goal of achieving a 25 percent UN peacekeeping assessment rate without incurring arrears.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1192 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Ensign to Amendment SA 1136.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1192 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To fulfill the Administration's request to move towards the goal of achieving a 25 percent UN peacekeeping assessment rate without incurring arrears.
